Guard00.synopsis: An Absolute guard at the entrance to the prison. She's the archetypal sadistic prison guard - finding the suffering of her prisoners amusing, and desperate to please her god / superiors.

AD_TortureBed.synopsis: In Moonrise prison - torture bed with bloodstains.Placed in the room where Minthara is sent after execution scene

Guard00_0.speaker: Adept Ghulen
Guard00_0.text: These cells won't stay empty for long. There are still so many who defy the Absolute.
Guard00_0.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped Balthazar (and this Nightsong) return to Moonrise. He's down in the Colony.NodeContext: Fervent, looking forward to more prisoners to torment.

Guard00_1.speaker: Adept Ghulen
Guard00_1.text: Take care, True Soul - there may be a traitor among us. Those prisoners didn't escape alone.
Guard00_1.context: InternalNodeContext: The prisoners successfully escaped from Moonrise's dungeons (perhaps all, perhaps only one)NodeContext: Conspiratorial - unaware that we are in fact the traitors

Guard00_2.speaker: Adept Ghulen
Guard00_2.text: We'll find the traitor - and it will be worse than a cell for them.
Guard00_2.context: InternalNodeContext: The prisoners successfully escaped from Moonrise's dungeons (perhaps all, perhaps only one)NodeContext: relishing a punishment to come

Guard00_3.speaker: Adept Ghulen
Guard00_3.text: Cover your nose by the cells. Those gnomes smell like labour.

Guard00_4.speaker: Adept Ghulen
Guard00_4.text: A little quiet down here, without the crying.
Guard00_4.context: InternalNodeContext: All prisoners died and failed to escape from Moonrise.NodeContext: Reflective - she misses the sounds of suffering

Guard00_5.speaker: Adept Ghulen
Guard00_5.text: Advisor Balthazar has taken the prisoners into his care. He'll shape them to Her design - even if he must break them first.
Guard00_5.context: InternalNodeContext: The player has helped Balthazar (and this Nightsong) return to Moonrise. He's down in the Colony.NodeContext: Smiling - whatever torture the prisoners suffered, it's nothing compared to what she knows Balthazar will do

Guard00_6.speaker: Adept Ghulen
Guard00_6.text: Didn't think the prisoners had it in them to escape. Well - I suppose they didn't, in the end.
Guard00_6.context: InternalNodeContext: All prisoners died and failed to escape from Moonrise.NodeContext: Last part is a snort - prisoners tried to escape, but all died in the attempt

Guard00_7.speaker: Adept Ghulen
Guard00_7.text: Be a dear and strike me deaf. Our guests are especially sobby today.

AD_TortureBed_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_TortureBed_0.text: *A torture rack. Chilling to behold, and even more so to imagine the horror its victims must have endured.*

AD_Minthara_EnteredPrisonArea_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_Minthara_EnteredPrisonArea_0.text: Few escape these cells. It's only thanks to you that I did.
